attributes.action: Faster mental health diagnosis,more support and faster treatment.
attributes.background:
More than half of the people in the uk suffer through poorly diagnosed, mistreatment and no enough support for mental health problems. 
The NHS needs to step up here and be more educated within mental health. Faster intervention, diagnosis and treatment.

rejection.details:
We think the following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/122040
